Бляяя, Макс, мне сейчас сон приснился, просто пиздец, это как пример какой-то фантастической легендарной игры в дбд. Короче играю я за Мэг Томас, против меня траппер, ну играем, вроде всё збс, сижу я чо-то, чиню генератор, всё тихо, маньяка не слышу, и тут я его починил и вижу через всю карту блять красные глаза блять, это ОН. Этот мудак вообще во всех окнах, через все доски, у всех входов в какое-то здание свои ловушки блять понаставил. Ну я убежал от него, по пути к генератору сломал его ловушку тулбоксом, который я нашёл в начале игры, потом начал резко чинить генератор и слышу КРИК блять маньяка через стену, я не слышал сердцебиения, я услышал его крик, потому что он попал в свою ловушку, еблан блять. Короче начинает он меня догонять, я убегаю в крови (дал мне хитулю, я блять даже почувствовал, это пиздец как больно было) и понимаю, что мои челы вообще ни одного генератора не завели, думаю: «Заебись..» Короче в очередной раз я от него убежал, залез в ящик и нашел там КИРКУ из майнкрафта, зачарованную на СИЛУ III, потом я опять попытался починить генератор, он меня услышал, а я ещё короче не вылечился и с первого хита нахуй упал. ТУТ САМОЕ ИНТЕРЕСНОЕ- ОН МЕНЯ БЕРЕТ К СЕБЕ НА ПЛЕЧО, И Я БЬЮ ЕГО КИРКОЙ ПО СПИНЕ, ОН МЕНЯ РОНЯЕТ, ВОЕТ ПИЗДЕЦ КАК СТРАШНО, А Я ЕГО ЕЩЁ РАЗ ЭТОЙ ЖЕ КИРКОЙ ПО КОРПУСУ ХУЯРЮ, ИЗ ЭТИХ РАН НАЧАЛ ПРОСАЧИВАТЬСЯ БЕЛЫЙ ЦВЕТ И БЛЯТЬ, ПОЯВЛЯЕТСЯ МАЙКЛ МАЙЕРС, НО ДОБРЫЙ И БЛЯТЬ С ЛУКОМ ИЗ МАЙНКРАФТА И ТОЖЕ НАЧИНАЕТ БИТЬ ТРАППЕРА, КОРОЧЕ МЫ ЕГО НАХУЙ УБИЛИ, МАЙКЛ ПОМОГ НАМ ПОЧИНИТЬ ГЕНЕРАТОРЫ, пока мы их чинили, он рассказывал нам, почему он стал маньяком и зачем он вообще убивает людей, я уже не помню почему, короче дочинили, открыли ворота, мои кенты сбежали, а Майкл меня такой останавливает и говорит, пойдём тип за мной, он показывает мне сундук и говорит, что кирку в любом случае придётся оставить, потому что этот предмет не должен оказаться в инвентаре в этой игре, потому что этого предмета блять просто нет, ну а вместо этого он дал мне 50 ящиков с инструментами инженера (охуенная вещь, мне нравится) и проводил меня до подвала, через который я убежал, предварительно с ним обнявшись, ПРИКИНЬ ЧТО ЗА ПИЗДЕЦ, Я ЕБАТЬ ОХУЕЛ

Good  game

Love the game, but pretty meh on the community.

A lot of people main either side and both have arbitrary rules of what the other side is and is not allowed to do. And so killer mains will hate survivor mains for playing with their friends and survivor mains will cry about killer mains tunneling (focusing on one survivor to get them out of the game as quickly as possible) or camping the hook, which admitedly is scummy, but at times a legitimate tactic.
This is nonsense. As long as you don't cheat, it's all fair. So if people start flaming for any legit tactics, just leave the chat.

Also, the matchmaking is pretty spotty at times, leading to people getting matched with people WAY outside of their skill-level. You'll usually notice when you're up against much more experienced players, but as long as you try your best, you might still learn something from that match.

So, now I've complained about the community and about matchmaking that admittedly screws new players over at times. Now why do I like this game? Well, I'm a masochist, so that is part of it. But the gameplay on both sides is genuinely compelling and fun.

Survivors are mostly skins that come with different abilities that you can unlock for all survivors to give you an edge in hiding or running away from the killer or simply fixing generators more quickly to power up the exit gates.

Killers, on the other side, are more diverse. While they all still have perks that can be transferred to other killers, every one of them has a specific mechanic that changes the gameplay on them. In that way, you have killers that are good at applying map pressure, killers that can sneak well and killers that have an edge on chases, allowing them to finish chases faster and complete the sacrifice.
While some killers are stronger (Spirit and Freddy Krueger), pretty much all are viable. My personal favorite is the Legion, one of the DLC killers and one of the strongest chasers, with the additional bonus of applying more map pressure by inflicting deep wounds on their victims, which they need to fix if they don't want to end up on the ground. Time that they cannot spend working on generators.

If you're interested in a game of high stakes hide and seek, give dead by daylight a try.

Gen rush

This game just gets better and better with every year. It's perfect for any fan of asymmetrical multiplayer horror games, and the devs have done an amazing job at growing the game and it's community over the years. They're constantly adding in new content, cosmetics, maps, survivors and killers from popular horror franchises, and the player base just keeps growing. The gameplay loop is enjoyable for an endless amount of hours and they've done a really awesome job of establishing the world and horror feel through the mechanics, gameplay and audio design. My favourite asymmetrical multiplayer horror game.
Jogo maravilhoso, se eu pudesse dava ele para todos amigos meu!

I bought this game to play with my friends, as it looked like an entertaining game. It was. The game at first is scary since you barely have a concept of how the game works, but the effect quickly wears off as you play more and more. This game is fun, the mechanics are fun, and the killers are fun. The only thing I would complain about is that players who don't pay money for this game will suffer when first starting out as the basic survivors and the perks given to you are not at all satisfactory and somewhat limited. In order to obtain better perks for both killers and survivors, you have to either pay money for DLC or you must use whatever perks, survivors, and killers that come with the base game. DLC is cheap, sure, but there are people that want to invest time into the game and seeing if it is enjoyable to play before purchasing DLC. Unfortunately, the game is not too fun with just the basic starting survivors, killers, and perks. The overall gameplay I would rate a solid 8/10. The reasons are stated above. New players, DLC is fun to have, but if you're trying to save money, I suggest you wait until the Summer or Winter sales before purchasing this game and/or DLC.

VOCÊ!!! isso mesmo VOCÊ, é o tipo de pessoa que tem amigos? compre Dead By Daylight e jogue com mais 3 amigos tentando fugir de um anti-social FRUSTADO com uma faca na mão. E VOCÊ ANTI-SOCIAL esta com vontade de acabar com rodas de amigos e promover a discórdia? compre Dead By Daylight e faça a MAGIA ACONTECER!!! GARANTA Dead By Daylight COM 5 KILLER E 6 SOBREVIVENTES INICIAIS!!! todos possuindo suas própias habilidades ÚNICAS!!! Modo de jogo personalizado pra 5 amigos (1 assassino e 4 sobreviventes) que não garante pontos também disponível.


 Atenção: algumas compras no jogo só podem ser adquiridas com dinheiro real são eles, killers e sobreviventes que se originaram em filmes ou series e cosméticos, personagens do própio jogo podem ser adquiridos jogando. esses personagens tem habilididades assim como qualquer outro, caso não compre os assassinos e sobreviventes de dinheiro real suas habilidades podem ser adquiridas pela entidade na loja do jogo de vez em quando, liberado semanalmente duas de sobrevivente e duas de killers. No modo de jogo personalizado TODAS!! as Habilidades estão disponíveis pra usar livremente mas os assassinos e sobreviventes não adquiridos não podem ser utilizados. Uma boa jogatina a todos.
